entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 3 except 8 north of Cape Ray.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in the Wreckhouse area near noon. High plus 3 except 8 north of Cape Ray. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of rain or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 2 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 4.
